alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Kaufman; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 7:36PM CST until March 02 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Hopkins County in north central Texas... Rains County in north central Texas... * Until 845 PM CST. * At 735 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Commerce to Lake Tawakoni to Kemp, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sulphur Springs, Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Mabank, Van, Edgewood, Emory, Kemp, East Tawakoni, Point, Cumby, Como, Fruitvale, Edom, Purtis Creek State Park, Lake Sulphur Springs, Cooper Lake State Park, Lake Tawakoni and Cooper Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 508 and 542. Interstate 30 between mile markers 110 and 142. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. These storms have a history of producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
